quests.desc: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First of all, you could, like, attempt to go west. After that, attempt to head north. Then, attempt to go east. Then, go to the east. Then, go to the north. And then, attempt to venture east. That done, make an attempt to go east. Next, try to go to the south. That done, try to venture south. And then, move south. After that, go west. Once you succeed at that, try to take a trip north. Then, attempt to take a trip north. Then, pick up the key from the floor of the kitchen. And if you do that, you're the winner!

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
Ah, the dish-pit. This is some kind of dish-pit, really great standard vibes in this place, a wonderful standard atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a spare room.

 You can see a toolbox.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You have moved into the most normal of all possible offices. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You see a bookshelf. The bookshelf is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the bookshelf you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You are in a vault. An usual kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a case.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The case contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The case is empty![end if] You can see a table. The table is standard.[if there is something on the s_1] On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the table.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You're now in the lounge. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.desc:

infos.desc:
You've just walked into a studio.

 You make out [if c_8 is locked]a locked[else if c_8 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] bureau right there by you.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The bureau contains [a list of things in the c_8]. Hmm. You always thought you'd be more excited to see a bureau in a room.[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The bureau is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a playroom, cool, but is it usual? You better believe it is.

 You see [if c_10 is locked]a locked[else if c_10 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] dresser.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The dresser is empty! There's something about an object in a room that's just so... TextWorld.[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a recliner. [if there is something on the s_5]On the recliner you can see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a canteen. A typical kind of place. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 Oh, great. Here's a chest.[if c_11 is open and there is something in the c_11] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_11].[end if][if c_11 is open and the c_11 contains nothing] The chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded.

 You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a suitcase.[if c_12 is open and there is something in the c_12] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_12]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if c_12 is open and the c_12 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to take a trip west. Okay, and then, go north. And then, make an effort to move east. Then, try to travel east. Then, move north. After that, make an attempt to go east. And then, venture east. And then, head south. Next, go south. And then, attempt to move south. With that over with, go to the west. Next, travel north. After that, try to go north. With that over with, recover the key from the floor of the kitchen. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
